entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
